alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 3:09PM PST until February 27 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A PAIR OF FRONTAL SYSTEMS TO AFFECT THE AREA... .Snow returns to the Olympics and Cascades tonight as the first of a series of frontal systems arrives. Snow levels will rise with a secondary system on Monday, but it could produce impactful snow at Stevens Pass before the snow level rises above the pass. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
